item.title: Tris-HCl-NaCl-MgCl2 Bacterial Lysis Buffer 1x
item.description:
for 1000 mL

Materials

Material Molecular Weight Specifications Location
tris base SDB 121.14 g/mol solid Â 
sodium chloride NaCl SDB 58.44 g/mol solid Â 
magnesium chloride MgCl2 Â· 6 H2O SDB 203.3 g/mol solid Â 
hydrogen chloride HCl SDB 36.461 g/mol 7.76 M (25%), liquid Â 
deionized sterilized Water dsH2O 18.015 g/mol liquid Â 
vakuum filter 0.22 Âµm Â 

Recipe

Material/Step Â Volume/Mass Â molar/%/comment
Â tris base 3.03 g 50 mM
Â NaCl 4.38 g 150 mM
Â MgCl2 0.51 g 5 mM
Â dsH2O 400 mL
Â HCl 25% pH to 8.0
Â dsH2O to 500 mL
Â filter through 0.22 Âµm vakuum filter
Â store @ 4 Â°C or in 50 mL aliquots @ â€“20 Â°C

Usecases

Usecase Â Specifications
Â Gluthatione-Sepharose Protein Purification
Â MagStrepÂ® Strep-TactinÂ®XT Beads Protein Purification
Â StrepTag Gravity Flow Protein Purification

Storage

Â Conditions Duration

@ 4 Â°C 1 month

item.title: Inoue Transformation Buffer
item.description:
for 1000 mL

Materials

Material Molecular Weight Specifications Location
PIPES SDB MOPES SDB 302.37 g/mol 241.26 g/mol solid solid, alternative buffer Â 
manganese chloride tetrahydrat MnCl 2 Â· 4 H2O SDB 197.91 g/mol solid Â 
calcium chloride dihydrate CaCl 2 Â· 2 H2O SDB 147.01 g/mol solid Â 
potassium chloride KCl SDB 74.55 g/mol solid Â 
deionized sterilizes Water dsH2O Â 
acetic acid CH3COOH SDB Â 
bucket of ices Â 
vakuum filter 0.22 Âµm Â 

Recipe

Material/Step Â Volume/Mass Â molar/%/comment
Â PIPES MOPES 3.00 g 2.10 g 10 mM 10 mM
Â MnCl2 10.89 g 55 mM
Â CaCl2 2.20 g 15 mM
Â KCl 18.65 g 250 mM
Â dsH2O to 800 mL
Â optionally cool on ice for approximately 30 minutes
Â adjust pH to 6.8 with acetic acid
Â dsH2O to 1000 mL
Â filter through 0.22 Âµm vakuum filter
Â store @ 4 Â°C or in 50 mL aliquots @ â€“20 Â°C
0:30:00
ðŸ””

Usecases

Usecase Â Specifications
Â Chemically Competent Bacteria Generation 50 mL of 1x Inoue transformation buffer for bacterial transformation with 8 mL being used for Inoue storage buffer

Storage

Â Conditions Duration
@ 25 Â°C 1 day
@ 4 Â°C 1 month
@ -20 Â°C 12 month
@ â€“80 Â°C
